title: Well, I found my new mid laner for when my team doesn't pick tanks...
body:
Up until now Ive been resisting the urge to try new swain, I said to myself I had to focus on learning Zoe before adding another new laner as well. But today I caved _(it was the coat, characters who wear their coat like that get me every time https://imgur.com/a/5voWo)_

Why is this allowed again?

He will most certainly be my new pull-it-out-the-ass mid laner, for when top decides to go teemo, jungle goes shaco and support goes sona/raka, and expects the Mid and ADC to go tank. _(happens way more often than you think in my ranked games..)_, and Galio is hit and miss because more often than not, the enemy are AD heavy.

I really like him _(and the ambient birds are a really nice touch)_, but uhhhh don't you think he's maybe still a little too oppressive?

replies.body: nah swap morello for spellbinder and glacial for seraph, great fun

I build situationally.
If they have healing/lifesteal i get morellos, if they are mobile, i get spellbinder.

apart from some core items, my builds on most champs change quite a lot per game.

its just fun to play with. i did specifically say great fun.

You take phase rush, ghost and that build then run around slowing everything while you have 7-800+ movespeed and more than enough damage to kill them

And riot doesnt consider him oppressive because he is reliant on their team not being mobile to kill them half the time.

Ill have to try it then!

fair enough about the movement thing _(all the champs worth killing have mobility anyway)._
somebody has never tried playing magic pen mundo mid. The idea is spam q... and that's about it. Once you've run out of magic pen items, just go tank.

He's in practice yes very powerful but he has the same problem as old swain still. mobility champions. Which is why in a teamfight, swain goes off a mfer. Who would try and kill him while he's healing and draining. Though sometimes, he does feel a bit oopsies strong
but when he doesnt feel oopsies strong he feels fucking shit
well, theres the balance. Not everyone is strong as every stage, fed, feeding. you know. thats game
